title: Premiere: Barbarossa – Thickening Air
content:
The second single from his highly anticipated forthcoming album, Lier, this latest track from Margate based James Mathé aka Barbarossa is a slick, soulful affair.

Having moved from his birthplace of London, and become a father since the release of his 2015 album, Imager, there’s no doubt plenty of stories to be told on Lier.

Thickening Air feels like a homage to truly classic songwriters, with its vibrant melodies and focus on the uplifting chorus. It’s songwriting at its most bewitching and downright addictive, and one of this years finest singles thus far.

Lier is released 30 March via Memphis Industries. Check out Thickening Air below, alongside upcoming tour dates after the jump.
